name: The Wörkflow
description:
The Wörkflow

Created by: Bence Balazs, Yü Li Chang Lin, Marko Mrsic, Nermin Topalovic, Florian Dueller, Kilian Fröhlich, Nicolas Wetscher

A small game made for the 2022 klujam where you play as an office worker.

Note: "Press Space" in the instructions is false, please press ENTER instead Theme

Punishment

Diversifiers
  • Groundhog Day
  • Gamebert
  • Wait, something changed
  • It's April fools!
  • Blackout
    • The Story

    You are an office wörker.

    Your task: wörk.

    But what happens if you stop wörking?
